result.execSummary:
The defendant Donny R Staudt was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Bail Jumping-Felony, a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(b).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: AODA assessment and follow through counseling.
Maintain fulltime employment, schooling, work search or combination.

Pay supervision fees in an amount to be determined by the Department of Corrections.

Submit to random urine screens and pay for same.

Maintain absolute sobriety.

Submit a DNA sample and pay surcharge.

Assessment, treatment, counseling as deemed appropriate by the Department's assessment process.

If probation is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

supervisions.notes: Concurrent with the prison sentence imposed on 20 CF 816.

Preliminary hearing on February 15, 2022 at 03:30 pm.

1:37 pm - Prosecuting attorney Jordan W. Feest appeared in court for the State of Wisconsin, Defendant Donny R Staudt appeared by video, Attorney James Gregory McCann appeared by video for Donny R Staudt. Defendant demands a preliminary hearing.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for February 15, 2022 at 03:30 pm.

Minutes.
Initial appearance on January 10, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

ADDRESS INFO for Donny R Staudt
Current: 4816 W. Custer Street, Manitowoc, WI 54220   (Effective: 01-07-2022)
Prior: 1305 N 10Th St, Manitowoc, WI 54220
RE:  Felony bail jumping as repeater, on 12-31-21.

$250.00 cash bail furnished and defendant is released from custody.
- Stacie Tadych @ 4816 W. Custer Street, Manitowoc, WI.
Order for Prints.
Commitment for Failure to Furnish Bail.

BAIL HEARING - 
Defendant in custody and appearing by video from the Manitowoc County Jail.  The State informs the Court that the defendant will be charged with the crimes of possess methamphetamine, felony bail jumping and possess drug paraphernalia.  The matters are continued for initial appearance on 01-10-22 at 1:30 p.m. Br. 1.  Bail is set at $250.00 cash with the conditions that he maintain absolute sobriety from alcohol and drugs and is not to possess any controlled substances.   Bail not furnished and defendant is remanded into custody.  Commitment for failure to furnish bail issued.  Copy filed.  Court orders photos and prints at MTPD.
Minutes.
